subject: Get a Bowflex (R) Home Gym Information Kit & DVD
body:
Get a Bowflex Home Gym Information Kit 
Shape up for Summer with a new Bowflex Home Gym. 
Learn about the Bowflex fitness workout that will give you the power to get the results you want. 
Get a Bowflex home gym information kit to: 

See real results from Bowflex home gym users 
View our informative DVD 
Learn about our 6 week fitness guaranntee* 

Just visit our site
and get a Bowflex Home Gym
information kit, including a DVD and a full-color brochure with more
pictures and fitness information. More than one million people have
experienced results from owning a Bowflex home gym. Now it is your
turn to feel the muscle, burn the fat and see results, in as little as
six weeks. 
The Bowflex Team 




To stop receiving announcements from Nautilus, Inc.
